summary: A mysterious Inspector investigates the wealthy Birling family and their dinner guests following the suicide of a young woman.
cast: Sophie Rundle|Lucy Chappell|Miranda Richardson|Ken Stott|Finn Cole|Chloe Pirrie|Kyle Soller|David Thewlis|Flora Nicholson|Gary Davis|Wanda Opalinska|Nigel Black|Clare Crowther|Philip Gascoyne|Margaret Wheldon|Patricia Winker
keywords: textile factory|birling & company|changing one's name|setting a table|decanter
title: Ha llegado un inspector
